Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin If exists (select * from inserted where (DATEDIFF(YEAR, empBirthdate, GETDATE()) <18)) begin print N'tuổi không thể nhỏ hơn 18'; rollback transaction; end end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create TRIGGER CheckAgeOnInsert on tblEmployee For insert As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO @Employee SELECT E.empSSN,E.empName,E.empSex,E.empSalary FROM tblEmployee E; UPDATE @Employee SET e_Name = N'Võ Việt Anh' WHERE Id_emp = 30121050184; RETURN END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION cre_emp() RETURNS @Employee TABLE ( Id_emp decimal(18, 0), e_Name decimal(18, 0), sex char(1), salary decimal(18, 0)) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO @Employee SELECT E.empSSN,E.empName,E.empSex,E.empSalary FROM tblEmployee E; UPDATE @Employee SET e_Name = N'Võ Việt Anh' WHERE Id_emp = 30121050184; RETURN END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION in_emp() RETURNS @Employee TABLE ( Id_emp int, e_Name char(50), sex bit, salary int) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT INTO tblEmployee(empSSN,empName) VALUES (@ID,@Name)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION Multiply (@a INT, @b INT) RETURNS INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: (SELECT empSSN,empName, empAddress, empSalary FROM tblEmployee WHERE empSalary >= @salary_max)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION salary_80 (@salary_max INT) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM tblEmployee WHERE empAddress = @addr AND empSSN = @code_emp

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM tblEmployee

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE SelectAllEmployees AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM tblEmployee WHERE empAddress = @addr

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM tblEmployee WHERE empAddress = @addr AND empSSN = @code_emp
